titles.title: A resolution designating September 21, 2024, through September 29, 2024, as "Blue Star Welcome Week".
A resolution designating September 21, 2024, through September 29, 2024, as "Blue Star Welcome Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution designates September 21, 2024, through September 29, 2024, as Blue Star Welcome Week and expresses gratitude for the sacrifices made by service members, transitioning veterans, and their families.
